meanings.definition: The quality or state of being round.
meanings.sent1: The roundnesses of the ball made it perfect for rolling.
meanings.sent2: I admired the smooth roundnesses of the pebbles on the beach.
meanings.sent3: The roundnesses of the cake made it look like a giant donut!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter had a contagious roundnesses that filled the room.
meanings.sent5: The artist captured the roundnesses of the apple with incredible detail.

meanings.definition: The round shape or form of something.
meanings.sent1: The roundnesses of the moon were visible in the night sky.
meanings.sent2: She loved the roundnesses of the balloons at the party.
meanings.sent3: The roundnesses of the basketball made it bounce in unexpected ways.
meanings.sent4: The roundnesses of the clouds in the sky resembled fluffy cotton candy.
meanings.sent5: The roundnesses of the pearls on her necklace shimmered in the light.
